message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a bargain price of $110. I think you'll find it's a great deal!
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for a better deal. I'm willing to pay $90 for the product.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. How about we meet in the middle at $100? That's my final offer.
I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $92 for the product.
Bob, I'm trying to be fair here. $95 is the absolute lowest I can go.
I'm getting close, but I still need to save a bit more. I'm willing to pay $93 for the product.
